WRITING.TEXT: oooh, I like that idea. I also know this first place does alterations and requires 3 fittings. She could definitely come with me for those to feel as though she's helping.
So true, im WAY overthinking this!
I did tell her the appt was at 1pm and to expect a ton of all angle photos! I do want her opinion, even if she isn't there! But i know she really wanted to physically be there.

WRITING.TITLE: Trying to Compromise on Who Comes for Wedding Dress Shopping
WRITING.TEXT:
Mini-rant. So, i asked my FMIL to go dress shopping with me. Background: my mom passed away 10 years ago, so unfortunately, i don't get to do the mother/daughter bonding thing. My dad is retired and lives outside of the country, so he can't do it either. So, I thought being my FMIL only has sons, and is really excited about this wedding, id ask her. GREAT! But, she has a ridiculous schedule. She's in Africa on vacay right now, and then comes back, and then goes away again in like a week and a half. So, we managed to book an appointment together March 11th.
Awesome. But then I find my MOH, my best friend, wants to come too. She isnt demanding about it, but i could tell she was bummed because she's going to be away that ONE weekend. She's free every other weekend but of course, FMIL isnt until mid April. We just got engaged and the wedding is in November, so I'm not trying to put shopping off.
After sending a bunch of annoying emails out (i felt like i was being annoying, anyway) trying to reschedule, i instead decided to do one appointment on 3/11 with the FMIL and one 4/1 with the MOH. Is that fair? My MOH felt better about it, but now im worried like...what if i find THE dress on 3/11 and then go...ooops sorry, we arent going 4/1 now?
I definitely have issues with always trying to keep people happy haha i realize this. been my whole life. Im also a planner, so i feel like i want a plan incase i DO have to say "sorry i found the dress." ugh. Im thinking about this WAY too much.
/endrant.

We got engaged ourselves 2/18, and we just booked the venue and have a date :) We are doing an engagement shoot with a photog friend that will be included in the STDs or we'd prob have those too haha it feels kind of nice to get things done, doesnt it!!!

WRITING.TITLE: We've Got a Venue A Date!
WRITING.TEXT: We saw 3 venues on Saturday and the 1st one we loved immediately, but of course wanted to give the others a chance. But by the end of the day we knew...the first one was the ONE. We are getting married Nov 18th of this year, the day before my birthday (so exciting!). We are waiting on our contract to be sent over so we can sign, but we are booking [The Pratt House](http://www.pratthouse.com/) on the Upper East Side in NYC (im a born and raised New Yorker, he's from Connecticut). It was built in 1919, has a rich history, and was just beautiful. It felt like "us." So excited to have that done!
Thank you! My fianc did a fantastic job considering all he knew was "sapphire or emerald" and "size 5."
Thank you! Pictures dont do it justice its really beautiful in the light. Its a sapphire with diamond trilliants, platinum band from Tiffanys. Its more than i ever expected and im in love with it!

WRITING.TITLE: Know How Much I Stare At This Ring? A lot! (Newly Engaged Last Week!)

WRITING.TEXT: Holy... moly. You look like a PRINCESS!

We live in NYC, looking at venues in connecticut and westchester county (just outside of the city). So yeah...we might have an issue. I guess in the end booking for november really will all depend on venue availability.

WRITING.TITLE: Is It Possible to Plan a Wedding in 9 months?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi all, new here. Just got engaged yesterday (eeee!) to my long term boyfriend of almost 5 years. We are already discussing timing, and he and I would love to actually have it early november. Are we insane? Mind you, im a CRAZY planner. Not in a "i get uptight way" just in a "I LOVE PLANNING" way. Always have been that way. Im already making lists of venues, i LOVE planning things. Are we going to be in trouble trying to get a venue we want at only 9 months out? Is it doable or should we realistically give more time? ( we were thinking March 2018 the latest). I assume i have to start looking at places/calling around NOW, which is fine, but are we really getting ourselves into stress city, or can it be done? **EDIT**: Thank you all to your feedback, you've made us feel a lot better about it. We've started reaching out to venues just to see if finding something is even POSSIBLE; and we'll figure it out from there.

Same for me and thats when i realized the anxiety and fear makes it worse. I might go before i leave, and then it usually makes me leave late, but once i get it in my head on the train that i might need to go again, it hits me. Gas,pain, urgency. My worst morning i got off the train 3 times for a bathroom. Got to work 45 min late
I'd respond and say "if the first draft is the full quality as expected, I'd appreciate full payment when you can." Then wait a bit and if it isnt paid out/resolved, take it up with upwork maybe.
Unfortunately I am not the drag queen Ivy Winters haha, but this video is amazing!!

In high school i had these, but no other symptoms of ibs. However i wonder if it was an early onset. Anytimeci had a test, a date, etc i had to poop. It was a normal bm everytime and sometimes i could hold it and the urge would pass. Now 15 yeara later anxiety is a huge trigger for me but instead of normal bms its D and harder tol hold

WRITING.TITLE: Worst bathroom situation ever
WRITING.TEXT: About a week ago im on my way to to work. I commute by subway a good hour but i know some stops to get off if i need to. Cue cramps and anxiety so i get off at a stop that has a bathroom, pretty rare as most subway stations closed their bathrooms years ago. Anyway ive gone here no problem at least half a dozen times by this point. But this time there's no toilet paper and i forgot to carry my wet wipes. Cue panic. Then i realize i have one of those free magazines they sometimes hand out by the entrance to the train. Yup. I used magazine pages. Not exactly soft and plush. Lesson learned, i never leave without wipes anymore.

$2850, for the first floor of a townhouse. 10 min walk to Ditmars. So Second floor is another tenant, and thats it. Our floor was going to be a 3 bedroom, but since its my boyfriend and I, we asked them not to build a wall they were planning on building in one of the rooms to make it 3. So the way it is set up for us, we have 1 bedroom, full kitchen, living room and large dining room. We also have the basement floor to ourselves which is my office; 1 1/2 bathrooms. Garage we share with the upstairs tenant, new washer and dryer, and a parking space. + the courtyard directly outside the building is also ours alone to use. We came from a 1 bedroom in the east village where we were paying $2650 for less than 500 square feet. So for us, this was a huuuuge space upgrade, even if we are paying on the higher end for astoria.

I have two pairs of heels that also wont go anywhere! Both are dressy for weddings, which are what they were worn for, once each. So maybe its just that no one specifically needs that at the moment. But so annoying they won't move. They are seychelles too, which is a brand that usually does well.
Thanks for the edit when i was typing quickly because im angry. Yes. Karina. Good on you for being a grammar nazi regardless of the sad situation. Bravo, bet your mom is proud.
I went to high school with Karina. She had a good heart and a great family. I am SO fucking glad they caught this guy. I really hope her family has a little peace.

I am working full time currently in the same field I am moving freelance in. I just told my boss, however, that im leaving in a few weeks. Ive been able to juggle it with 3 freelance clients, and i work 50 hours a week or so at an agency. If you think you can juggle it, by all means.
yeah it was something i didnt even realize at first! It really does feel like a NY pizzeria, and its such a nice little quiet back area (for now, at least!).

WRITING.TITLE: Finally Got to Stay at a Deluxe Resort!

WRITING.TEXT: Yeah, normally takes me an hour to work (i live off ditmars, i work in dumbo). took me an hour and 35 min between getting repeatedly stopped on the N, and then also the F. and then even on the way home tonight, the W jus stopped for a good 10 minutes between 39th and 36th and then crawled the rest of the way (this around 7:30pm).
SAME. I get on the subway here in NYC...boom... gas, cramps, and trying to clench and hold it in. All because i know i dont have easy access to a bathroom.

Im giving 2 more months to my current full time job before i go freelance full time from a home office. I work 50-60 hours a week for a job that pays me on a 40 hour a week salary. so not worth it + my IBS makes things so difficult.
The same for me! Tomorrow can't come soon enough!

I know some people here have mentioned having disney vacations in the past, or wanting to go and worrying about it. I had a request on my channel to talk about it after I revealed I have IBS so i thought I'd share!

WRITING.TITLE: Made a Requested Video on How I Cope with IBS at Disney World

WRITING.TEXT: 3 days for me! Have a blast!
This is great, thank you! It seems they DO have a smith machine (its all the way to the left on your first photo)

WRITING.TITLE: Any Experience At Muscles Bustles Gym at Boardwalk or the Gym at Grand Floridian?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi everyone, i have some pretty specific questions but figured maybe someone here could help as I've been searching around but having a hard time finding the answers. Do either of these gyms have a smith machine? Do they have squat racks? I ask because i want to keep up my weight lifting regimen when im down there next week but I have no idea what is available. I assume they both have free weights, but it's more that I'm wondering if ill be able to do squats and other leg exercises. Thanks!

I wear my Fitbit Flex in the shower without a problem. i dont generally soak it or swim with it, but still, water has definitely gotten IN the band and it's been 100% fine.I'm looking to upgrade to an Alta and i too cant bite the bullet on price ($120!)

That lifting is fun as hell. I only started lifting November 2016, after 3+ years of on and off gym going because i hated it. And honestly... lifting is stupid fun and satisfying. Which I had done it sooner.

I just did a [video on this last week](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nKKOH3VgJw t=189s) you might find helpful. In general, i always advise a good hoodie or light jacket, just in case. I run cold, so those evenings get chilly for me. I can comfortably wear jeans all day in January weather.

I work in the social media industry with big brands. Facebook is pay to play. It doesn't help the little guy, and even the big guy doesn't get far without a ton of money behind posts. I don't think it's worth it; Id stick to Twitter, Twitch, Instagram.
haha yuuup. "black means im bleeding! guess im dead."
Thanks! you too!
Pepto unfortunately gives me an after effect the day later of dark, soft BMs. I freaked out at first and found out that bismuth can cause very dark blackish/green BMs. So i stick with immodium.

You look fantastic. I needed to see this! Been lifting for 2 months and eating better + adding protein and im the same exact weight. I know its prob due to muscle, but it was so discouraging this morning. But this made me feel better :)

Upped my squat to 90lbs! I'm 5'2, and 115. I told my boyfriend when im squatting my own body weight, I'm treating myself to a nice massage ;) Also did deadlifts for the first time ever today, with the hex bar. I like 'em!
My boyfriend is my gym buddy/trainer but i would love to go with another woman, that would be awesome. If anyone lives in Astoria, Queens, hit me up ;)

Yesterday it took me an hour and 40 minutes to get home from work. Normally it takes an hour (im in NYC so i commute via subway). I didnt get home until almost 8pm. The old me would've said "its too late to go to the gym, ill just go tomorrow." New me literally talked to myself on the way home "you're making excuses. just go." and i did! Small win, but an important one!
Good to know. I work out 4-5 times a week, 2-3 cardio and 2 weight lifting. I was doing a lot of it over the week and that may have helped as well.

WRITING.TITLE: I'm Now Convinced It's 75% Stress
WRITING.TEXT: I was off for just over a week for christmas break as my agency I work at was closed. I just came back today. Over break I had only 1 incident of really bad D, otherwise while i did have urgent BMS in the morning, it'd be one or two and id be totally fine rest of the day. Im back to work today and boom; problems. Had to get off the subway mid commute and find a bathroom. then get here and am ok for about 3 hours and then suddenly bad D. keep getting an odd stomach pain/cramp and run to the bathroom and yeah. 3 times already. Had to take imodium. Now i feel like im convinced stress/anxiety is causing the bulk of this. I was so un-stressed being at home for a week and was fine. This is pushing me more and more to freelancing full time.

WRITING.TITLE: Selling Leather Couch Desk In Ditmars Area
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys, we moved into the hood about 2 months ago and are redecorating and so getting rid of some old furniture. Selling a leather couch from Raymour Flanigan, it has a little damage from our cat. We are also selling a computer desk pretty cheap. it's veneer has been chipped but can easily be fixed with a wood marker. We really need these out, and are trying t sell couch for $200 and desk for $80 but are willing to negotiate. aptdeco links with images are below (prices a little higher here because of the percentage they take to cover delivery, but if you pick up we will sell for less):
https://www.aptdeco.com/catalog/raymour-flanigan-black-leather-couch-3
https://www.aptdeco.com/catalog/staples-brown-computer-desk-w-shelving
That was my thinking, price wise it's probably still cheaper to get this and a topper. thanks so much for the feedback!

WRITING.TITLE: Experience with DHP Futons?
WRITING.TEXT:
DHP seems to be a brand that pops up on all the major furniture sites like overstock, hayneedle, wayfair etc. The futon in question is this one: http://www.hayneedle.com/product/dhp-brent-futon.cfm?ltype=child tid=AMW982-1
This is meant to be seating in our basement and a way for people to crash if need be; it won't be used nearly as much as our living room couch. But i don't want people to be crazy uncomfortable on it either. We just didn't want to spend too much . on something that's only going to get use once in a blue moon.
Any experiences with this brand? Is it better to get this and a mattress topper, or just spend the $$ on a better futon?

Wayfair sells the same brands as Amazon, Overstock, Hayneedle. Shop around, i often find the same item on multiple sites and sometimes they have vastly different prices. Also have had personal hit and miss experiences, but again, its not Wayfair's furniture, its all about the brand.
22 days myself! wishing you all a magical trip!

Not that sad! I think thats awesome. I would definitely still write to them; you never know, this woman may be fairly well known for her voices and so they might be able to figure out who it is easily :)
That truly is the best thing to do! It really does get back to the right people.

WRITING.TITLE: How To Compliment or Thank a Cast Member

WRITING.TEXT: It didnt work for me after over a month of use but that doesnt mean it wont work for YOU. Stick with it for a couple of weeks before you make any judgements.
I always love making new friends!! :D
Thanks to those who encouraged me to share my story, i finally did on my youtube channel. I hope it helps you guys not feel so alone!

WRITING.TITLE: I Finally Shared My Story, Thank You To Those Who Encouraged Me

WRITING.TEXT: My solo experiences have always been my best experiences! have fun!

WRITING.TITLE: [For Hire] Social Engagement Manager Strategist
WRITING.TEXT: I'm currently a full time Sr. Engagement Manager at an agency in NYC and looking to freelance as well. I have 6+ years of experience in copywriting, community management, content calendar creation and execution, and strategy. I touch accounts for nationally recognized brands every day on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, and Pinterest. If you're looking for anything from a social audit strategy to an actual community manager, please PM me with your needs.

I can take my work computer home currently, but I work with larger teams on national clients, and cannot do all my work remotely. I need to be present for internal meetings, client presentations, etc. I am considering moving to freelance though because I work in social media and so I think i could do exactly as you say, work over Skype, and from home easily.

Ive been on and off diff meds, diff diets, for 4+ years. I mean, i wouldnt solely turn to working from home for IBS; i don't enjoy an office 9-5 and would rather be my own boss. And in my field (social media engagement manager with 6+ years of experience), I can be. I do know going full time freelance is a lot of hustle, however. But, IBS has also pushed me to it.
Did you quit and plan to freelance? or did you just quit for time off?

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone work from home due to IBS?
WRITING.TEXT: I often consider quitting my full-time job and switching to full-time freelance because my ibs-d can be so debilitating. Like this morning I have a client meeting at their offices and right now I'm sitting on the toilet. I still have about a half an hour before I have to leave but my anxiety has already started and it really depresses me that I even have to think about these things. I do take Imodium and some Fiber to help it but I still have days where I'm thinking well is today the day that it's going to be liquid , is today the day that I'm going to have an accident? The problem is financially I'm not in a great position to quit stay home. I share an apartment with my boyfriend and I need to pay rent and I don't have enough saved to get me through the next few months yet. Has anyone else dealt with this or made this decision? Has it been worth it for them? I don't think it'll turn me into a hermit, I do love traveling and I love going out with my friends. But to take the pressure off in terms of work and feeling like I can't do my job well I think it would really help my state of mind and just how I deal with things physically.
I was looking into that place off Broadway! Im not so worried about pickup anyway, im not in a rush so knowing me id end up picking up a day or two late anyway ;)

WRITING.TITLE: Recommendations on a custom frame store?
WRITING.TEXT: I need 2 rolled canvas prints stretched and mounted; anyone recommend a place in the 'hood that does a decent job of custom framing?
I used Minas from Modern Spaces. Guy was a gem, broker fee was only 1 month rent. He grew up in astoria so knows it well. Super nice, not sketchy like other brokers usually are.
I have been known to work on my laptop while on the toilet. I get it! Feel better!
Don't got to SI doesn't mean it's scary, it means it's boring ;)
Definitely a good deal. I live on 11th between B and C and pay $2600 for a 1 bedroom that is definitely not that big (part of the reason im moving to queens shortly!).
we won't be moving in until after Halloween this year, but that makes me excited for next year! I LOVE HALLOWEEN! I'll be vying for best candy on the block award for sure ;)
We were really jealous of the people eating in the diving bell haha
Thanks! all super helpful.

WRITING.TITLE: I Finally Got to Get Drinks At Jock Lindseys! Loved It!

WRITING.TEXT: what a lovely surprise. Instead of just a whole surprise trip, a surprise extra day at an awesome resort! great plan!

WRITING.TITLE: Best Restaurants/Bars By Ditmars?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi all! I am moving to Astoria in 3 weeks, found a lovely place on 46th street off Ditmars Blvd. I am from Queens originally, (Kew Gardens, born and raised), live in Manhattan right now, and queens has been calling me back home. The area of Astoria I've always known is by Steinway off the R; I don't know Ditmars as well. My boyfriend and I are big restaurant goers and love a good bar (both sports bars/dive bars and nicer places). Any recommendations in the area you guys love?
That sounds awesome. Thanks for the suggestion!
Thanks, I'll look into those!

WRITING.TITLE: I want to get into Black Panther... where do I start?
WRITING.TEXT: I'm a bit of a comic book noob. I've only ever really read Batman comics through my lifetime, and otherwise I'm jumping in to new characters here and there (Deadpool being the most recent). I was at NYCC yesterday and went to the Black Panther panel, came out of there like "hell yeah i need to read more!" but I am overwhelmed. Where do I start? Any recommendations for certain issues/stories/writers?
I do. Dishonored did this nicely.

WRITING.TITLE: What's The Best Way To Find Out Value of My Mom's Vintage Jewelry?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi all! My mom passed away quite a few years ago and I received all her jewelry. There are a few earrings of which I don't know if any gems are real or if they are just costume jewelry. She had some brooches from the 60s and plenty of stuff from the 70s and 80s. Would i have to take these to some place to look at? I live in NYC so if anyone has a suggestion of where ,that would be helpful. I want to sell them, but I don't want to accidentally sell something under value. Thanks!
Same here, no results. No help but also nothing negative. Everything remained as usual.
That actually would make sense.
I dropped the weight fairly quickly though; which is why im wondering if its water weight/retention. I mean, 4lbs in a week is not a normal rate haha

WRITING.TITLE: Feeling Better From IBS-D and...losing weight?
WRITING.TEXT: How does THAT work? I always assumed running to the bathroom all day every day would cause me to lose weight. Instead i found i had put on 5lbs that i never was able to lose. I've been taking fiber (Heather's Tummy Fiber) and so far, ive only had 1 issue in the past week. I have also lost like 4lbs. Was that just all some weird bloating/retained water from feeling ill? How does having normal BMs actually cause me to lose weight, as opposed to D? I'm more interested in the science of it, if anyone can figure it out! Im certainly not complaining, its just...weird!

My boyfriend, who I have an inkling is proposing soon :) despite my problems he's patient and keeps me sane. My job. I really love what I do (social media strategy and management for really large national brands) and I like to push myself to work hard to prove I can be a bad ass despite this stupid illness. Travel. You'd think I'd hate it and yes, airplanes stress me out, but I love seeing new places. I don't want ibs to stop me from living a full life.
The subway is panic attack city for me, for sure. And I take it every day to work. Otherwise I walk anywhere I can and have a very good idea of places that will let me use their restroom if need be
Oh my bad! I searched for it but i guess i was using the wrong keywords.

WRITING.TITLE: For Those Who Have Funky Colored Hair, Does It Affect How You Dress?
WRITING.TEXT: [removed]

me too! if i get a little drunk, suddenly i forget i even have issues. But i regret it so much the next day! My boyfriend and I live in NYC (I grew up here) so yeah...plenty to do but...can't always do them.

yup. I used to be an out every weekend, go to the bar, go get dinner with friends kind of girl. Now, half the time my boyfriend goes out (maybe 75% actually) i decline and let him just go see friends without me and stay home :-/

So far, so good. Less pain in the mornings. BMs are fully formed, if anything they come out in small round pieces so not perfect. Though randomly on Saturday, i had a normal BM, then suddenly pure liquid, (not even anything in it, like, water)....then a normal BM again. So THAT was weird but i chalk it up to just my IBS being...IBS-y. Otherwise its been good. Im taking half a teaspoon twice a day, morning and evening. Though i did forget to take it this morning so we'll see if thats immediately noticeable or not.
haha yes i think you're correct :)

When I picked up my AP in August thats what they informed me. As in you can NOT use it sept 15th 2017. you CAN use it on sept 14th, 2017 until midnight. does that make sense? I think people auto assume they cannot use it on the 365th day but you CAN.

it will expire 366 days from the day you ACTIVATE it. Not the day you BUY it. so the first park day you actually use it. so, if you use it September 14th, 2016, it'll expire September 15th, 2017. as in, you can still use it on sept 14th 2017 for the full day.
I just received it today; I will update in a few days time and let you know how it goes.
I dont get stabbing pains, but my intestines feel tired and very uncomfortable for hours. it's a feeling i am very aware of and can do nothing about until it disappears in 3-4 hours.

WRITING.TITLE: Is Spinach the Death of Anyone Else?
WRITING.TEXT: I love spinach, i really do. Cooked by itself, in pasta, spinach dips...but i am regretting having pizza with spinach on it last night. 4 hours after taking imodium and im still having issues, so i took more. Is spinach rough for anyone else with IBS-D? I chew it as well as possible, eat it with plenty of water, but it still forces thing to move...quickly. and sometimes comes out undigested. Why does my body hate yummy, leafy things? argh!

WRITING.TITLE: Dealing With The Loss of a Parent
Dealing With The Loss of a Parent

WRITING.TEXT: agreed, but i think there are some that are more "book 180 days out or forget ever eating there."

WRITING.TITLE: Disney World Restaurants You Should Book 180 Days Out

WRITING.TEXT: Depends. We tried some diet changes first before going with meds.depends on what's going on with you and what you want. She'll work away from meds if you don't want them but if you do that's done too

I came to her with D, pain, daily bloating, etc. She did an extensive test of celiac, crohns, lactose intolerance, gastritis, allergies, and then a colonoscopy to make sure of nothing else. She's been treating me about 3.5 years though admittedly when I was doing better I stopped going to her like an idiot. Got worse and came back and she was as welcoming as ever.
Dr foont. She is lovely. Did all my tests, best bed side manner ever. Really listens and answers questions. I love her and highly recommend her.
Just finished my 3rd visit and I'm on vacation :( took 2 imodium 3 hours ago but about to pop a 3rd so I can enjoy my day
Definitely not travelers diarrhea. It's no worse than my usual days. I have the same issue even at home.

Kid less! I travel often with adult (also kidless) friends. Likely wouldn't be more than 2 or 3 of us on this trip I'm thinking of so I've booked a little mermaid room for now but just trying to learn more about the resort

WRITING.TITLE: Can someone tell me about Art of Animation?
WRITING.TEXT: I've stayed in all the all starts plus pop, I've stayed in all the moderates except Caribbean. Art of Animation throws me a bit because it seemed themed similar to a value yet talked up a bit more (and a bit more pricey). Are little mermaid rooms bigger than other values or same size? Is the overall appeal that is just the newest resort? Is it as busy comparatively to values?would love personal thoughts, reviews. thanks!
I had to skip out on going to Lisbon today. My boyfriend's whole family went but I was so afraid of more D. I'm sitting in our vacation rental, crying. Yay ibs.

WRITING.TITLE: Imodium doesn't help for AM issues. Ever.
WRITING.TEXT: Anyone else found that imodium doesn't seem to affect your worst time of D? I'm currently on a trip in Portugal and have taken 2 imodium every morning and within an hour or so I feel better but I still get painful bms or in this mornings case, really mushy D. I've even tried taking 1 or 2 at night in the past to sort of prepare for mornings and yet it still doesn't work. It'll hold me over test of the day but if my body wants to have issues in the AM it doesn't matter what I take, it will. Is that normal? Should I try taking more than 2?
I love Coronado. It's quiet, it's beautiful (especially at night) , great pool, lakeside bar, hammocks everywhere. it feels serene, something you won't get at a value.
That friend would be me :) thanks for recommending us!
